more importantly,"},{"lineNumber":73215,"originalJapaneseLine":"　総統司令部の場所はリーザス城にしましょ！","translatedEnglishLine":"let's make Lizas Castle the location of the supreme command headquarters!"},{"lineNumber":73216,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ね、ね、ね、はい、けってーい！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Right, right, right, okay, decided!\""},{"lineNumber":73217,"originalJapaneseLine":"「こらこらこら、勝手に決めるな！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, hey, hey, don't decide on your own!\""},{"lineNumber":73218,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そうですね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That's right.\""},{"lineNumber":73219,"originalJapaneseLine":"リーザスへの対抗心を帯びたクリームの声は低い。","translatedEnglishLine":"Cream's voice, filled with rivalry toward Lizas, was low."},{"lineNumber":73220,"originalJapaneseLine":"「リーザスに総統司令部があるのは","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Having the supreme command headquarters in Lizas"},{"lineNumber":73221,"originalJapaneseLine":"　力関係的によくありません」","translatedEnglishLine":"is not good for the power balance.\""},{"lineNumber":73222,"originalJapaneseLine":"「総統司令部を守る、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Protecting the supreme command headquarters,"},{"lineNumber":73223,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それを後ろ盾に今後、何を他国に要求するか","translatedEnglishLine":"and using that as a backing to demand things from other countries in the future,"},{"lineNumber":73224,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ〜ら、貧乏なヘルマンなんかと","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh my, I don't want to be lumped together with poor Herman,"},{"lineNumber":73225,"originalJapaneseLine":"　一緒にして欲しくないんだけどなー」","translatedEnglishLine":"you know.\""},{"lineNumber":73226,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……司令部を置くなら、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...If we are to place the command headquarters,"},{"lineNumber":73227,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ここはヘルマンに願います。","translatedEnglishLine":"then I ask that it be in Herman."},{"lineNumber":73228,"originalJapaneseLine":"　我が国なら中立を維持することが出来ます」","translatedEnglishLine":"Our country can maintain neutrality.\""},{"lineNumber":73229,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ちょ、ちょっと待ちなさいよ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"W-Wait a moment!"},{"lineNumber":73230,"originalJapaneseLine":"　勝手に決められたらたまったもんじゃないわ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"We can't have decisions made without our consent!\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィルの脳裏に、カラーの村にある
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In Seer's mind, the Red Eye that attacked in the cave in the village of Color appeared.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 洞窟で襲ってきたレッドアイの姿が思い浮かぶ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The image of the Red Eye that attacked in the cave in the village of Color crossed her mind.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あのキチガイ魔人……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That crazy demon..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 姿が見えないと思ったら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I thought I couldn't see him,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こんなタイミングで来たか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and yet he came at such timing."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「かなり厄介な相手……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Quite a troublesome opponent...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: というより戦ってはいけない相手ですね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Or rather, he's an opponent we shouldn't fight."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんとか防ぐことは出来んのか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Is there any way to defend against him?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……すみません、おじ様。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...I'm sorry, uncle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うう、それは、難しいかと……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Uh, I think that's difficult..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「向こうは30万の大軍です。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "They have a large army of 300,000.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 作戦の立てようがないんです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There's no way to plan a strategy."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まともに戦おうと思うなら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If we plan to fight them seriously,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: せめて各国で戦っている人類軍を全て
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: we would at least have to gather all the human armies fighting in each country.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 集めなければいけないでしょう……」
「それは……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That is..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 意味ないわなあ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: meaningless, isn't it?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ええ、それでは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes, because if we do that,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今度は各国が奪われるだけです……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: then each country will just be taken away..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「加えて、そんなことしても
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Moreover, even if we do that,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここが人類軍の総本山と知られた以上、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: now that this is known as the main base of the human army,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 第二波第三波と攻めてくるのは明白」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it's obvious the second and third waves will come attacking.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ここでの徹底抗戦自体、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "A full-fledged fight here itself,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 意味がないってんだな？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is meaningless, right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうですね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's right.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 話はもう、総統司令部をどこに移転させるか、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The discussion has already moved to where to relocate the supreme command headquarters,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そういう段階に来ているかと」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it's come to that stage."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが唸る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance groaned.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「総統司令部をどこの国に置くか検討し、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We will consider and decide which country to place the supreme command headquarters in,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 決定致しますが、総統は――」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and will make a decision, but Supreme Commander—"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そのとき、ドアがけたたましく開いた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that moment, the door burst open loudly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それならとーーぜん！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Then of course!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザスよね、ダーリン！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It has to be Lizas, right, darling!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「リア！？　お前、なんでここに！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ria!? Why are you here!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「えっへへー♪　ランス城が大変って聞いたから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ehehe~♪ I heard Lance Castle is in trouble,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リア、心配で来ちゃった♪」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so I came because I was worried♪"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……耳の早い奴」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Quick on the uptake."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「情報自体はこちらにも来ていたので、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The information itself came to us as well,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そろそろランス城が危険だろうと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so I predicted Lance Castle would be in danger soon.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 予想して来ただけですよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I just came ahead of time."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まさか、それが明日のこととは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I never thought it would be happening tomorrow though...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 思いませんでしたが……」
「さあさあ、そんなことよりも、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Now, now, more importantly,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 総統司令部の場所はリーザス城にしましょ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: let's make Lizas Castle the location of the supreme command headquarters!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ね、ね、ね、はい、けってーい！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Right, right, right, okay, decided!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こらこらこら、勝手に決めるな！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, hey, hey, don't decide on your own!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうですね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's right."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザスへの対抗心を帯びたクリームの声は低い。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Cream's voice, filled with rivalry toward Lizas, was low.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「リーザスに総統司令部があるのは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Having the supreme command headquarters in Lizas

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 力関係的によくありません」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is not good for the power balance."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「総統司令部を守る、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Protecting the supreme command headquarters,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それを後ろ盾に今後、何を他国に要求するか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and using that as a backing to demand things from other countries in the future,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ〜ら、貧乏なヘルマンなんかと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh my, I don't want to be lumped together with poor Herman,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一緒にして欲しくないんだけどなー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you know."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……司令部を置くなら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...If we are to place the command headquarters,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここはヘルマンに願います。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: then I ask that it be in Herman.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 我が国なら中立を維持することが出来ます」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Our country can maintain neutrality."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちょ、ちょっと待ちなさいよ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "W-Wait a moment!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 勝手に決められたらたまったもんじゃないわ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We can't have decisions made without our consent!"

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィルの脳裏に、カラーの村にある
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In Seer's mind, the Red Eye that attacked in the cave in the village of Color appeared.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 洞窟で襲ってきたレッドアイの姿が思い浮かぶ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The image of the Red Eye that attacked in the cave in the village of Color crossed her mind.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あのキチガイ魔人……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That crazy demon..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 姿が見えないと思ったら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I thought I couldn't see him,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こんなタイミングで来たか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and yet he came at such timing."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「かなり厄介な相手……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Quite a troublesome opponent...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: というより戦ってはいけない相手ですね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Or rather, he's an opponent we shouldn't fight."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんとか防ぐことは出来んのか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Is there any way to defend against him?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……すみません、おじ様。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...I'm sorry, uncle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うう、それは、難しいかと……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Uh, I think that's difficult..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「向こうは30万の大軍です。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "They have a large army of 300,000.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 作戦の立てようがないんです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There's no way to plan a strategy."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まともに戦おうと思うなら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If we plan to fight them seriously,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: せめて各国で戦っている人類軍を全て
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: we would at least have to gather all the human armies fighting in each country.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 集めなければいけないでしょう……」
「それは……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That is..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 意味ないわなあ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: meaningless, isn't it?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ええ、それでは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes, because if we do that,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今度は各国が奪われるだけです……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: then each country will just be taken away..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「加えて、そんなことしても
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Moreover, even if we do that,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここが人類軍の総本山と知られた以上、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: now that this is known as the main base of the human army,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 第二波第三波と攻めてくるのは明白」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it's obvious the second and third waves will come attacking.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ここでの徹底抗戦自体、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "A full-fledged fight here itself,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 意味がないってんだな？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is meaningless, right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうですね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's right.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 話はもう、総統司令部をどこに移転させるか、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The discussion has already moved to where to relocate the supreme command headquarters,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そういう段階に来ているかと」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it's come to that stage."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが唸る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance groaned.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「総統司令部をどこの国に置くか検討し、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We will consider and decide which country to place the supreme command headquarters in,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 決定致しますが、総統は――」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and will make a decision, but Supreme Commander—"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そのとき、ドアがけたたましく開いた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that moment, the door burst open loudly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それならとーーぜん！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Then of course!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザスよね、ダーリン！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It has to be Lizas, right, darling!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「リア！？　お前、なんでここに！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ria!? Why are you here!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「えっへへー♪　ランス城が大変って聞いたから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ehehe~♪ I heard Lance Castle is in trouble,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リア、心配で来ちゃった♪」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so I came because I was worried♪"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……耳の早い奴」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Quick on the uptake."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「情報自体はこちらにも来ていたので、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The information itself came to us as well,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そろそろランス城が危険だろうと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so I predicted Lance Castle would be in danger soon.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 予想して来ただけですよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I just came ahead of time."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まさか、それが明日のこととは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I never thought it would be happening tomorrow though...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 思いませんでしたが……」
「さあさあ、そんなことよりも、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Now, now, more importantly,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 総統司令部の場所はリーザス城にしましょ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: let's make Lizas Castle the location of the supreme command headquarters!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ね、ね、ね、はい、けってーい！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Right, right, right, okay, decided!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こらこらこら、勝手に決めるな！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, hey, hey, don't decide on your own!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうですね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's right."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザスへの対抗心を帯びたクリームの声は低い。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Cream's voice, filled with rivalry toward Lizas, was low.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「リーザスに総統司令部があるのは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Having the supreme command headquarters in Lizas

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 力関係的によくありません」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is not good for the power balance."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「総統司令部を守る、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Protecting the supreme command headquarters,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それを後ろ盾に今後、何を他国に要求するか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and using that as a backing to demand things from other countries in the future,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ〜ら、貧乏なヘルマンなんかと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh my, I don't want to be lumped together with poor Herman,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一緒にして欲しくないんだけどなー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you know."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……司令部を置くなら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...If we are to place the command headquarters,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここはヘルマンに願います。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: then I ask that it be in Herman.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 我が国なら中立を維持することが出来ます」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Our country can maintain neutrality."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちょ、ちょっと待ちなさいよ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "W-Wait a moment!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 勝手に決められたらたまったもんじゃないわ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We can't have decisions made without our consent!"
